title: Ticket #4309: Our data file transfer plugin is not very useful
description:
We have a file transfer plugin for the data: URL type. The form recognized by the plugin mostly follows the standard data: format, including the use of a comma to separate the description of the data from the data itself. This means that you can't use a data: URL in the input file transfer list, as Condor will interpret it as two different input filenames.

One possible solution is to depart further from the standard data: format. Already, we require the addition of two slashes after the initial data: and the addition of a slash and a filename at the end of the URL.
creator: jfrey
